mapper.select: select a.id,a.uid,a.qid,a.content,a.create_time as createTime,a.support_nums as supportNums, b.nickname,b.headerimg,b.intro, CASE WHEN c.id IS NULL then 0 else 1 end as isSupport from zl_answer as a left join zl_customer as b on b.id = a.uid left join zl_answer_record as c on c.answer_id = a.id and c.uid = #{userId} where a.qid = #{questionId} and a.examine = 1 order by a.support_nums desc,a.create_time desc

select a.id,a.uid,b.nickname,b.headerimg,b.intro,a.qid, a.content,a.create_time as createTime,a.support_nums as supportNums,a.examine, c.uid as quesUid,d.nickname as quesNickname,d.headerimg as quesHeaderimg,d.intro as quesIntro, c.iid,c.info_class as infoClass,c.title,c.content as quesContent,c.create_time as quesCreateTime, CASE WHEN ca.title IS NULL then spec.`name` else ca.title end as source from zl_answer as a left join zl_customer as b on b.id = a.uid left join zl_questions as c on c.id = a.qid left join zl_customer as d on d.id = c.uid left join zl_specification as spec on spec.id = c.iid and c.info_class = 1 left join zl_application_case as ca on ca.id = c.iid and c.info_class = 2 where a.uid = #{userId} and a.examine = 1 and c.examine = 1 order by a.support_nums desc,a.create_time desc
select COUNT(*) from zl_answer as a left join zl_questions as b on b.id = a.qid where a.uid = #{userId} and a.examine = 1 and b.examine = 1

SELECT a.id,a.content,a.create_time createTime,a.examine,IF(ac.id>0,ac.title,s.name) infoTitle,q.content questionContent,c.nickname,c.headerimg FROM zl_answer a LEFT JOIN zl_questions q ON a.qid=q.id LEFT JOIN zl_application_case ac ON ac.id=q.iid AND q.info_class=2 LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON s.id=q.iid AND q.info_class=1 LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON c.id=a.uid
WHERE q.examine = 1 AND IF(ac.id>0,ac.del=1,s.del=1) AND c.del=1 order by a.id desc
